blogPost.excerpt: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
blogPost.body: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
blogPost.title: 3D Hand Gestures - Cute hand gestures for your designs.
blogPost.author: Barış

localize.description: 这是我的第一个3D插图包，我已经准备了15个卡通风格的3D手势，可以用于用户界面、社交媒体帖子、演示文稿、信息图表和横幅。
這是我的第一個3D插圖包，我已經準備了15個卡通風格的3D手勢，可以用於用戶界面、社交媒體帖子、演示文稿、信息圖表和橫幅。

previous.excerpt: This is a collection of multiplayer speed-typing games to kill boredom in Slack workspaces and Discord servers.
previous.title: Fastest Fingers for Slack and Discord - Multiplayer speed typing games for Slack and Discord

localize.description: 这是一个多人速打游戏的集合，可以在Slack工作空间和Discord服务器上打发无聊的时间。
這是一個多人速打遊戲的集合，可以在Slack工作空間和Discord服務器上打發無聊的時間。

next.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
next.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD

localize.description: Still旨在帮助你缓解焦虑和强迫症的症状。利用有针对性的信息帮助您将注意力从焦虑或强迫症中拉出来，以及呼吸练习，Still帮助您避免最糟糕的状况，并阻止它的发生。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助缓解焦虑和强迫症症状的应用程序。

localize.description: Still旨在幫助你緩解焦慮和強迫症的症狀。利用有針對性的信息幫助您將注意力從焦慮或強迫症中拉出來，以及呼吸練習，Still幫助您避免最糟糕的狀況，並阻止它的發生。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助緩解焦慮和強迫症症狀的應用程序。
